Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28805 affecting package ntopng for versions less than 5.2.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-28805 affecting package ntopng for versions less than 5.2.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ntopng is earlier than 5.2.1-3, affected by CVE-2022-28805
